text: Yaël Braun-Pivet (born 7 December 1970 in Nancy) is a French lawyer,Manon Rescan (22 July 2017), Les débuts difficiles des LRM à la commission des lois Le Monde. activism associative and politician. She was the Minister of the Overseas from May 2022 to June 2022. Yaël was member of the Socialist Party (PS) and then of En Marche (now La République en Marche). She was elected as member of the national assembly on 18 June 2017, as a representative for the department of Yvelines. She is Chair of the Committee on Constitutional Laws, Legislation and the General Administration of the Republic in the French National Assembly. ==Personal life== Braun-Pivet is married and has five children. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:French lawyers Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Nancy
title: Yaël Braun-Pivet
